meanings.definition: A type of fungus that typically has a woody fruiting body with pores on the underside.
meanings.sent1: The forest floor was covered with small polypores.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the polypore under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The polypore seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the other mushrooms.
meanings.sent4: The polypore's pores were like tiny windows into its world.
meanings.sent5: Children loved to search for polypores during nature walks.

meanings.definition: Any fungus of the family Polyporaceae, characterized by a fruiting body with many pores.
meanings.sent1: The polypore family includes a wide variety of fungi.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often come across polypores while exploring the woods.
meanings.sent3: The polypore family reunion was a fungi-filled affair.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a polypore city bustling with activity.
meanings.sent5: The old tree trunk was a canvas for colorful polypores.
